mean_cn: vt.邂逅，偶遇；  n.偶然碰见，遭遇
mean_en: to meet somebody, or discover or experience something, especially somebody/something new, unusual or unexpected; to experience something, especially something unpleasant or difficult, while you are trying to do something else
sentence: I've never thought that I'd encounter my favorite star one day!
sentence_trans: 我从没想过有一天可以遇到我最喜欢的明星！
